mapper.update: UPDATE REGBOARD SET LIKENUM = LIKENUM + 1 WHERE MENU_ID=#{menu_id} AND IDX=#{idx}
mapper.select: SELECT FILENAME FROM FILES WHERE IDX=#{idx}
SELECT r.idx, r.menu_id, r.cont, r.regdate, f.sfilename, r.title, f.idx fileidx FROM REGBOARD R LEFT OUTER JOIN FILES F on R.IDX=F.IDX where R.MENU_ID = 'MENU01' order by R.REGDATE desc
